@mythmon Mainly, the only components that gave me issue were form-related, which I expected. Essentially, form inputs wouldn't update, acting as if they were disabled.

I narrowed the issue down to the form wrappers we have in utils/forms, which wraps all of the inputs. Returning PureComponents there would not trigger updates, I'm assuming since Ant is not using immutable data structures internally to track form stuff.

Outside of those wrapped components everything seemed fine, which makes sense since we use immutable everywhere else.
